resources.string: Hello, welcome to my personal app, I am an enthusiastic student living in Ireland since October 2018 when I left behind my lovely family in Brazil to strive for new opportunities and personal growth in Ireland. Here I am living with a marvelous and kind irish family which I love and care so much. I consider myself blessed, despite difficulties I am always surrounded by people who helped me and motivate me to keep working hard to follow my dreams. This is my first mobile application, hope you enjoy know a little bit more about myself!

In Brazil I finished a Bachelor of International Business at UCS - Universidade de Caxias do Sul - RS, and now I am studying Bachelor of Science in Computing at Dorset College - Dublin, since 2020. My native language was German till I went to school in Brazil and learned portuguese, and the last few years I am practicing some English
Some of my skills are: Critical thinking, Communication, Creativity, Flexibility,Teamwork, Professional Ethics, Responsibility and now learning a lot of new skills in science in computing.

In my free time, I want to stay as far as I can from my pc. For relaxing and stretching I like practise Yoga,sometimes watch series on Netflix, painting, dance, listen to music, hiking and cycling.To be honest, sometimes feels like the day should have thirty hours for we be able to do everything and still have some free time for our hobbies.

The first of my family to leave Brazil and traveling around Europe. After finishing a degree in International Trade in Brazil, I decided to start a second degree in Europe. When you live far away from your home town, anything you conquer looks a big achievement, you have to get a job to pay for your studies, a place for live with dignity, manage time to socialize and increase your network of friends.
